title: (x) Handwritten looking serif face - Minya {Brandon S}
content:
Hello - I am trying to identify this handwritten font. Thanks so much!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [handwritten.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030837/http:/typophile.com/files/handwritten.jpg) | 68.82 KB |

 [‹ (x) "Post-Wood" 3D shadowed slab serif - Vineta {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030837/http:/typophile.com/node/40572 "Go to previous forum topic") [Informal hand written script as found on a number of invitation albums ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030837/http:/typophile.com/node/40570 "Go to next forum topic")
author: laurabachman

comments.content: Not an exact match, but nice: [Providence](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030837/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=providence&x=10&y=9), also available as Providence Sans.
More of this style available in [this list](http://web.archive.org/web/20080111030837/http:/typographica.org/000737.php).
